params.name: id
params.description: description

params.name: name
params.description: description

params.name: createdAt
params.description: Date and time created. UTC

params.name: updatedAt
params.description: Date and time last updated. UTC

params.name: id
params.description: uniquue id of the campaign within HILITE

params.name: uid
params.description: name of the campaign (ex. _"Super Bowl Victory Dance"_)

params.name: teleprompter
params.description: Instructions for your campaign. Text description of what kind of content you wish to receive.
params.exampleValue: Show us your best victory dance!!

params.name: isPublic
params.description: Defaults to false. Setting this to true publishes your campaign to public feeds such as the HILITE app.

params.name: organizationId
params.description: Unique id of the organization this campaign is associated with.

params.name: status
params.description: Short description of the campaigns current status.

params.name: createdAt
params.description: Date and time created. UTC

params.name: updatedAt
params.description: Date and time last updated. UTC

params.name: organization
params.description: Conforms to the organization specification.

params.name: uniquue id of the deliverable within HILITE
params.description: description

params.name: url
params.description: Path to the uploaded file.

params.name: campaignId
params.description: Uniquue id of the campaign this deliverable is associated with.

params.name: createdAt
params.description: Date and time created. UTC

params.name: updatedAt
params.description: Date and time last updated. UTC

params.name: brandedUrl
params.description: Path to the uploaded file after it has been processed, normalized, and optimzied by HILITE.

params.name: producer
params.description: Conforms to the producer specification. Optional metadata about the person uploading the deliverable.

params.name: displayName
params.description: Display name of the producer.

params.name: email
params.description: Email address of the producer

params.name: firstName
params.description: First name of the producer

params.name: lastName
params.description: Last name of the producer

params.name: uid
params.description: Unique ID from YOUR systems. Provides a way to uniquely identify this producer. We recommend that you use this to store their user id or some other unique identifier.

params.name: data
params.description: Store any additional information about the producer, such as social media handles or tracking information in plain JSON format.

exampleValue.customFieldName: the data object is a place for you to store custom data unique to your organization. This field is just an example.

params.name: id
params.description: Uniquue id of the webhook within HILITE

params.name: displayName
params.description: Display name of the webhook

params.name: description
params.description: A description of the webhook
params.exampleValue: A description of what the webhook does

params.name: webHookHandle
params.description: Every webhook has a unique handle that we use to identify it by. One way to think of it is like an event name that we are listening for. Handles will always be all uppercase and snake case.

params.name: organizationId
params.description: Uniquue id of the organization within HILITE

params.name: url
params.description: The url that the webhook should send a POST request to. Defaults to null if not defined.

params.name: createdAt
params.description: Date and time created. UTC

params.name: updatedAt
params.description: Date and time last updated. UTC
